title: I have 20-30Ms but my FPS stays at 30
body: Whenever i get into a game i start out with 60 frames but then it degrades to 30 and it hinders my ability to react to things going on. I have the game visuals set to medium and I have a decent ping of 20-30. I also have the frames capped off at 60 fps, but i don't know what to do to increase my fps.

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, it's very likely this is caused by some recent Windows updates that enabled a feature called *Game DVR* inside the Windows Game Bar, that has been causing FPS issues and system crashes for some players. I recommend disabling this feature following [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to ensure this is not the case.

Let me know what you found out after disabling the Game Bar.
So i followed the link and did what it said but im still getting 30 Fps in my game. I went into the xbox settings and turned off the game DVR which is what the link said. But still no difference

Gotcha. In that case, this is probably caused by an issue with your display driver or hardware, in which case you should work through the steps in our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to address the most common solutions.

Hit me up with the results you find after taking those steps.

No, luck. i submitted a ticket through the support page but i selected the "issue was resolved button" when i got into a 1v0 custom with 300 fps only to find in a ARAM game im still with 30fps. I reset my display driver, i change settings in Nvidia, and i changed my power settings but still no luck.

Damn, sorry to hear that. In order to troubleshoot this further, we'll need to take a close look at your system logs. I recommend running these logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a new [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists will reach back out as soon as possible.

Let me know if you run into issues submitting your ticket.

Well, idk what i did but while waiting for someone to reply i decided to play an Aram game since they are more layed back and found myself with 100+ fps so i decided to cap it at 144 at it has been around 144 for the past few days and i've played maybe 4-5 games with no trouble.

I'm having the same issue. I am using the old client, and everytime i launch league, I have to press the launch button 2-3 times and wait about 2 mins for it to launch. Once I manage to get into champ select, my chat bugs out and is delayed by 5-10 seconds. Skip to ingame, I start out with 60 fps (My PC is capable of runnign most games at 60 fps at highest settings, league shouldnt be an issue, never had this issue). 

I noticed that if I alt+tab out, back, or die, my fps drops to 30 as well and it starts to tear and while not unplayable, its harder to kite/teamfight especially as an adc.
